thread.title: Pedestrian throws HIMSELF at passing car in Huddersfield
thread.title_full: Pedestrian throws HIMSELF at passing car in Huddersfield

title: Pedestrian throws HIMSELF at passing car in Huddersfield
text: Share this article Share He then even gestures towards the red Vauxhall Corsa and hits it with his elbow as though it’s somehow the driver’s fault! He finally walks off as though what happened was perfectly normal. After landing heavily on the bonnet the unidentified man quickly began slipping off He then fell into a heap on the floor in front of the - thankfully stationary - car (pictured) The man who filmed the footage on his dashcam said on Facebook: 'After this he had a fight with a traffic bollard and then almost got hit by another car and had a go at that driver too.' Another person commented: 'That poor driver was probably terrified for a few seconds there. And what if he'd damaged the car? He'd be out of pocket too through no fault of his own.' Following the bizarre incident he appears to shout at the driver before casually strolling away Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
